Pros-  
Good quality materials  
High rpm(21000)  
5 year warranty on motor  
Lifetime free service (as mentioned on the leaflet)  
  
Cons-  
Jars make noise  
Wire is small as compared to the over old mixer  
There is no Authorised service centre in rajasthan

This is a very good mixer grinder. While many of the mixers I looked at had
two jars for grinding and one big jar which can be used only for blending, all
three jars of this mixer can be used for wet grinding. I have a Prestige mixer
and its blender jar can be used only for whipping milk shakes or things like
that. I could not even puree tomatoes for juice. The large jar in this Preethi
mixer is good enough for wet grinding, which is perfect for me. The medium jar
is somewhat small, but I spoke to the Preethi service centre and they had a 1
Lt jar which I bought. Then this becomes the perfect mixer. Prompt and
efficient delivery by Amazon. Preethi service is excellent. The small jar was
defective .The lid did not close properly. Took it to the service centre with
the bill and warranty card and they replaced the SS part of it.

Worth buying. Bought it for Rs.3000.

We have purchased it 5 months back, bigger jar we have not used at all has
been broken itself.. How can I get it exchanged..

I have been using preethi ecochef plus since last 7 years. It wasn't perfect.
I had to repair the Bush of the mixie every 4 months. After a while I bought
extra and put them handy because when you use it for more than 10 minutes it
would heat up and the Bush would melt. Also the sound was horrible. It got too
loud and I bought this new version of blue leaf. Now I feel the eco chef was
much better than this. The coriander seeds aren't becoming a fine powder.. You
cannot make Vada batter in it, the smallest jar lid is too tight, once you
close it you can't open it. I don't use the smallest jar anymore. I would
never buy a preethi mixie ever again.

Writing this review after one week of use. Performs as expected. Blades are
sharp and grind well quickly. Jars fix well in place and easy to remove also.
The base strongly sticks to surface and hence does not move while applying
twist force to remove the jar. Do not try to lift the base all at once. It
will be hard. Lift one leg at a time, it will come up easily.  
  
The noise level is as per spec. It is not a low noise grinder and the
manufacturer never claims the same. The only issue is there seems to be jerk
when the blades start rotate from zero speed. Not sure whether it is expected.
The other mixer that we have does not have this jerk feeling. Hopefully its
not an issue.

Till now product has worked ok and i hope it works like that in coming days
also. Quiet fast and really quiet as compared to Sumeet we had earlier.

review:
Nice and powerful mixer, using it for more than a month and the mixer is
working fine without much noise (when compared to the 750W motor power)

Using from 6 Months.  
Being used almost daily.  
Powerful and Jars are very nice with smooth finishing.  
No change in Performance with last 6 months wear and tear.

The product was delivered on 20th Feb 2018. The jar's blade drive coupler
became loose. On inspection the threads found damaged and unable to hold tight
and take the load. However the Motor side OK till date. Shows a poor
workmanship / quality .. the Almighty knows!  
Would request the supplier / Amazon to assist in exchange of the drive coupler
& blades as a set.

Very good product from Amazon and cloudtail. I bought this on lightning deal.  
\- Excelled eye catching aero design.  
\- Chutney jar is having preethi logo but the other two jars are likely local
ones without any logo. But it fits and works well.  
\- Noise is minimum compared to my previous one.  
\- Doesn't get heat quickly.

Very useful for south Indian dishes

Cons.  
1\. It sounds like a saw mill.  
2\. Some Jars are not useful because of inappropriate blades  
  
Prons.  
1\. Jars are made of good steel  
2\. Delivery was fast and good package

It's really a nice product. I got it for 3k during great Indian sale. Worth

awesome actually as they fit perfectly. It grinds everything without any

fifth star had gone for toss. Go for it if you can't afford for Platinum.

review:
Bought this mixer three months ago, noisy and blades sharpness is not enough
for complete grinding, always leaves chunk of pieces, tried with all jars at
different speeds.  
Quality of plastic is not of superior as well as jars steel and lids quantity.  
Go for higher end model may adds up INR 1500 more.  
  
Previously I happily used Kenstar stallion for 12 years, only issues with
jars, replace it for every four years, lack supply of genuine spares in
market.

Just recieved the new one. The one we were using previously was also from
preethi. Amazingly we have used dat for a long 14 years without any issues.
Great brand. Hope the new one wouldnt disappoint us.

I am using it more than a month. Its working as expected.

the good-  
a light indicator to show when power is on- no more wasted electricity when
not in use  
2 chutney jars- no more panic in case of emergency grinding and leftover
chutney in one jar  
plastic connectors- no more hassles of rusting/peeling off etc. the blue color
is added beauty.  
  
the bad-  
the motor makes too much noise, as a new machine. dread to think what will be
the condition some years down the years

I received product with the brand box was tampered..the jars are not original
...it's fake..there is no preethi name written in jars...I checked in show
room...those jars having preethi name written in it..so this is big cheating
by cloud tail..don't buy this this product..I instruct every one to check your
jars and return it

Mixer is good, but the small pot lid is very difficult to remove. And the lid
shape is so bad that u will end up tearing your hand to remove the lid from
pot.

About Amazon packaging /delivery: Packaging was good. Delivery was timely, in
fact came 1 day ahead of time.  
About this Mixer: The product is good, all 3 mixie containers work perfectly
fine. ( I have been using only for a month now - but on regular basis). The
reason for giving 4 stars is - whenever I operate on number 2 or 3, the
contents of the mixie get super hot. For eg: if I am grinding
masala/chutney/dosa batter, and I run it on number 2 or 3, then within 15
seconds of operation, the contents get hot (not warm). Not sure why. So I
don't know how long the motor will last. Having said that, it does grind
things to smooth texture.

It's a great grinder for home use. Better than most brands available online.
Have been using it for 2 months without any complaints. And as far as i know,
the customer service of preethi is also quiet nice. Highly recommended.

Had great expectations on the product. The blades are fixed and almost touch
the bottom of the jar hence even small pieces of tomato remain in pieces.
Quality is poor. The lid of the chutney jar gets tight once you grind chutney
and is impossible to open. Nothing beats my good old panasonic mixer. The
quality and performance is excellent compared to this mixer.

After use of one week. Powerful and not too noisy. Item was not handed over
directly to us, instead handed over to security guard without informing us.
Amazon please make sure the delivery persons to call and get confirmation
before handing over to security guard of the apartment.
